Reviews.Title: sucks ! DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: Nelle
Reviews.Content: this is a 2G Phone Dont Even Waste Your Money On This Piece Of Crap When U On The Phone People Can Barely Hear You. It Hangs Up In The Middle Of Your Calls. When You Download Things It Take Forever. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY

Reviews.Title: phone sucks
Reviews.Author: kandi mcdonald mann
Reviews.Content: this phone sucks ..... it was bought for my daughter for her birthday, the phone freezes up all the time , u cant receive r send pics Bluetooth don't work.... don't get the phone...

Reviews.Title: Pain to use
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: sucks. not worth the money to buy. You would be better off with a nice real brand name phone.  Camera sucks.

Reviews.Title: Great phone.
Reviews.Author: Antonio Lacey
Reviews.Content: Great buy ,feel good and works soo good made a good choice in buying this phone,would recommend to friends to purchase

Reviews.Title: Satisfied Customer!
Reviews.Author: SabrinaD
Reviews.Content: The devices arrived as promised and were easy to set up. They work just fine and even came with ear buds and an extra battery.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked 2 Sim with Android 2.3 smart Phone
Reviews.Author: Ajogbo
Reviews.Content: The Quad phone has a great voice clarity,ultra slim and unlocked but the picture quality is bad and dull when compared to the Samsung galaxy phones.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: treb
Reviews.Content: fast delivery recomend to all customer. i didnt try but its affordable. and easy to use it.and no damage.thanks for the phone

Reviews.Title: Will keep it of someone could explain how to use it because it is a wonderful phone
Reviews.Author: MARCIA B.
Reviews.Content: I it a beautiful phone.  I know it is a knock off of a name brand phone so there has to be a real user manual some where.  The one that comes with it is in such small print it is very difficult to read And it doesn't give enough info for a person who has never had a touch screen anything.  I cant even find out how to make it ring loud enough to hear it.  I put my t mobile sims card in it and it did all sorts of things but I have to have a real manual if I am going to use it and since I can't find the real brand.  I will probably send it back.  But if some wise soul has an idea on who might be the real maker of the phone let me know.  It is like buying the generic can of beans at the store and trying to figure out which company actually packaged and sold them under some name that doesn't exist.  Thanks.  marciabostrom@gmail.com

Reviews.Title: Bad choice
Reviews.Author: Leslie Washington
Reviews.Content: Nice phone, but it will not connect to server, i asked to return it the same day i received it and i was told to send picture of how sim card is inserted. Know one wants to hear that their not smart enough to put in a sim card, but I done what was asked and i havent heard anything else from the seller, the phone does not work.

Reviews.Title: no service
Reviews.Author: adrianna spann
Reviews.Content: Pretty phone but service is horrible. Wouldn't recommend to buy this item. Good when outdoors but when inside nothing works

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: Yolanda Wilson
Reviews.Content: This phone was another mistake to get. When it comes to charging the phone. Why send two batteries for the phone if they both don't work. What a waist of time.

Reviews.Title: NOO
Reviews.Author: Ashley M
Reviews.Content: According  to several places the cell phone is not made to last in the us for more than a week. my husband and i were excited about getting this phone until we were told that.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed in the phone
Reviews.Author: Donna  Mills
Reviews.Content: very disappointed, poor instruction how to operate the phone could not charge could not turn on need lot more improvement

Reviews.Title: Does not work well.
Reviews.Author: Alex Macias
Reviews.Content: The phone keeps dropping calls and shuts down on its own. Going to return it break back to Amazonand hope for a refund or one that will actually work.

Reviews.Title: Phone work for two weeks
Reviews.Author: keisha lorde
Reviews.Content: I spent money on a toy. It dont work battery was dead from day one cant get a replacement battery no where. Phone always abruptely shuts down. I wish i could get my money back

Reviews.Title: is a nece product.
Reviews.Author: James D. Elton "jdelton"
Reviews.Content: Hi this is a great phone and i am happy with it. it is for my brother and he likes Versizon but this only supports T-Mobile and AT&T; but he got it activated just the same and it is great.he likes it and i am happy that i bought it.sincerely i thank you for the timely sending and nearly perfect product. jdelton
